name: Death In Time
description:
Download the desktop version at the bottom of the page for better performances

Death is never late. As The Reaper itself, you are charged to harvest the souls of some villagers. Be carefull, you shall not come too early, nor too late.

Controls
  • WASD to move.
  • Space to jump (hold to jump highter).
  • Get near a villager to kill it automatically.
Scoring
  • You get better score by killing a villager when its time has come, when its progress bar is full and the skull icon lighten up.
  • If you don't kill them in time, their progress bar depletes. When it reaches 0 the villager dies anyway granting 0 point.
